metaTags.title: Kurumim: The new generation of Garatéa-E || Zenith EESC
metaTags.description: Our educational project to promote curiosity and scientific initiation in basic education through the contact with Space.

kurumimCard1.title: Conquering The Moon
text: */Kurumin/* is the next step from the */Garatéa-E/* Project, keeping its commitment to */promoting education and scientific initiation/*.
This year, keeping in mind NASA's Artemis Mission, the project's theme will be */Conquering the Moon/*.
Even though it is not mandatory that your project fits the theme, projects that fit are eligible to participate in the Competition.

kurumimCard2.title: Expanding the project
text: Our goal is to reach even more children. Given that, we'll be accepting participants from all */Latin america/*.
The projects will be attached to a probe and sent to the stratosphere.

kurumimCard3.title: Kurumim Sat
text: Our goal is to bring children closer to satellite development
The teams that won Garatéa-E's last edition will be invited to test a new CanSat model, the */Kurumin Sat/*, that has multiple sensors, a board computer and an energy module.
The children will learn */programming concepts/*, developing their */logical thinking/* and */having fun/* whith this development kit.

kurumimCard4.title: Can't wait to participate?
text: Before registering, it's important to read the participation notice.
